span.span: Provides the ability to iterate through subpaths in a and test the types of shapes contained in each subpath.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用`startIndex`和`endIndex`复制路径数据的一系列指定的参数。Use the `startIndex` and `endIndex` parameters to copy a specified range of the path data. ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径。Creates a graphics path. - 使用多个基元和一些标记填充它。Populates it with several primitives and some markers. - 列出在屏幕左侧的路径数据。Lists the path data on the left side of the screen. - 创建并倒带它。Creates a and rewinds it. - 递增到第二个标记的路径数据索引。Increments the path data index to the second marker. - 调用方法包含的开始和结束之间的路径数据复制到的点索引和类型数组。Calls the method to copy the path data contained between the start and end indexes to the points and types arrays. - 列出所复制的数据在屏幕的右侧。Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建图形路径。Creates a graphics path. - 使用多个基元和一些标记填充它。Populates it with several primitives and some markers. - 列出在屏幕左侧的路径数据。Lists the path data on the left side of the screen. - 创建并倒带它。Creates a and rewinds it. - 递增到第二个标记的路径数据索引。Increments the path data index to the second marker. - 调用方法路径将数据复制到`points`和`types`数组。Calls the method to copy the path data to the `points` and `types` arrays. - 列出所复制的数据在屏幕的右侧。Lists this copied data on the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 指示与此 关联的路径是否包含曲线。

span.span: Indicates whether the path associated with this contains a curve.

returns.span: 如果当前子路径包含曲线，该方法返回 ；否则，返回 。

span.span: This method returns if the current subpath contains a curve; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 路径中的所有曲线的贝塞尔样条序列作为都存储。All curves in a path are stored as sequences of Bézier splines. 例如，当将一个椭圆添加到的路径，你指定的左上角、 宽度和椭圆的边框的高度。For example, when you add an ellipse to a path, you specify the upper-left corner, the width, and the height of the ellipse's bounding rectangle. 这些数字 （左上角、 宽度和高度） 不存储在路径;替换;椭圆转换为四个贝塞尔样条序列。Those numbers (upper-left corner, width, and height) are not stored in the path; instead; the ellipse is converted to a sequence of four Bézier splines. 路径存储终结点和这些贝塞尔样条的控制点。The path stores the endpoints and control points of those Bézier splines. 一个路径存储数据点的数组，其中每个属于一行或的贝塞尔样条。A path stores an array of data points, each of which belongs to a line or a Bézier spline. 如果某些数组中的点属于贝塞尔样条，然后返回`true`。If some of the points in the array belong to Bézier splines, then returns `true`. 如果数组中的所有点都属于行，然后返回`false`。If all points in the array belong to lines, then returns `false`. 某些方法平展的路径，这意味着在路径中的所有曲线将都转换为的行的序列。Certain methods flatten a path, which means that all the curves in the path are converted to sequences of lines. 已合并路径后，将始终返回`false`。After a path has been flattened, will always return `false`. 调用， ，或方法类将路径展平。Calling the , , or method of the class will flatten a path. ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建对象， `myPath`。Creates a object, `myPath`. - 将添加三个线条、 矩形和椭圆。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 创建对象`myPath`。Creates a object for `myPath`. - 测试以查看是否当前路径`myPath`包含一条曲线。Tests to see if the current path `myPath` contains a curve. - 在消息框中显示测试的结果。Shows the result of the test in a message box. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 将迭代程序移至路径中的下一个标记。

span.span: Moves the iterator to the next marker in the path.

MemberSignature.Value: public int NextMarker (System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath path);
.method public hidebysig instance int32 NextMarker(class System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath path) cil managed
Public Function NextMarker (path As GraphicsPath) As Integer
public: int NextMarker(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::GraphicsPath ^ path);
member this.NextMarker : System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath -> int

param.name: path
param.span: 将点复制到其中的 对象。

span.span: The object to which the points will be copied.

summary.span: 此 对象具有与之关联的 对象。

span.span: This object has a object associated with it.

summary.span: 方法将关联的 增加到其路径中的下一标记，并将当前标记和下一标记（或路径末尾）之间包含的所有点复制到下一个传入该参数的 对象。

span.span: The method increments the associated to the next marker in its path and copies all the points contained between the current marker and the next marker (or end of path) to a second object passed in to the parameter.

returns.span: 此标记和下一标记间的点数。

span.span: The number of points between this marker and the next.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以设置路径中的标记。Use the method to set markers in a path. 标记用于创建组的子路径。Markers are used to create groups of subpaths. 一个或多个子路径可以是两个标记之间。One or more subpaths can be between two markers. ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 将添加三行、 矩形、 椭圆和两个标记。Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers. - 列出了在屏幕左侧的所有路径指向的值。Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen. - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 创建对象， `myPathSection`，以接收复制的点。Creates a object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points. - 调用方法，它循环到的第一个标记，并将该标记和到下的一步之间包含的所有点都复制`myPathSection`。Calls the method, which iterates to the first marker and copies all the points contained between that marker and the next to `myPathSection`. - 返回点复制到数目`markerPoints`。Returns the number of points copied to `markerPoints`. - 列出标记号 （第一个标记） 以及它包含在屏幕右侧的点数目。Lists the marker number (the first marker) and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以设置路径中的标记。Use the method to set markers in a path. 标记用于创建组的子路径。Markers are used to create groups of subpaths. 一个或多个子路径可以是两个标记之间。One or more subpaths can be between two markers. ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 将添加三个线条、 矩形和一个椭圆使用标记之间。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse ¾ with markers between each. - 向屏幕绘制点的数组的值。Draws the values for the array of points to the screen. - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 调用 方法。Calls the method. - 使用从对迭代的调用返回的值绘制开始和停止每个标记到屏幕的点。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to to draw the start and stop points for each marker to the screen. - 向屏幕绘制的点总数的值。Draws the value for the total number of points to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 将添加三个线条、 矩形和椭圆。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 列出的所有点的左侧屏幕的值。Lists the values of all the points to the left side of the screen. - 创建并倒带它。Creates a and rewinds it. - 在`for`循环，循环访问使用点和方法。In a `for` loop, iterates through the points using the and methods. - 使用从迭代调用返回的值来列出子路径编号、 中点的数量和屏幕的右侧的路径点的类型。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to list the subpath number, the number of points in it, and the type of the path points to the right side of the screen. - 到屏幕中显示的点总数的值。Displays the value for the total number of points to the screen. 请注意，`ListPathPoints`是 helper 函数，用于分隔大多数 （并非所有） 的图形路径代码中的显示代码。Note that `ListPathPoints` is a helper function that separates most (not all) of the display code from the graphics path code. remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 将添加三行、 矩形、 椭圆和两个标记。Adds three lines, a rectangle, an ellipse, and two markers. - 列出了在屏幕左侧的所有路径指向的值。Lists the values of all the path's points to the left side of the screen. - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 创建对象， `myPathSection`，以接收复制的点。Creates a object, `myPathSection`, to receive copied points. - 调用方法，它循环到的第三个子路径 （图），并将包含的所有点都复制到该子路径中`myPathSection`路径，并且还返回点数目复制到`subpathPoints`。Calls the method, which iterates to the third subpath (figure) and copies all the points contained in that subpath to the `myPathSection` path, and also returns the number of points copied to `subpathPoints`. - 列出子路径编号和它包含在屏幕右侧的点。Lists the subpath number and number of points it contains to the right side of the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#7)]

member this.NextSubpath : * * -> int

param.name: startIndex
param.span: [out] 接收下一子路径的起始索引。

span.span: [out] Receives the starting index of the next subpath.

param.name: endIndex
param.span: [out] 接收下一子路径的结束索引。

span.span: [out] Receives the ending index of the next subpath.

param.name: isClosed
param.span: [out] 指示子路径是否已关闭。

span.span: [out] Indicates whether the subpath is closed.

summary.span: 将 移至路径中的下一子路径。

span.span: Moves the to the next subpath in the path.

summary.span: 下一子路径的起始索引和结束索引包含在 [out] 参数中。

span.span: The start index and end index of the next subpath are contained in the [out] parameters.
The number of subpaths in the object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例专用于 Windows 窗体，并且它需要 `e`、事件对象。The following example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, an event object. 该代码执行下列操作：The code performs the following actions: - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 将添加三个线条、 矩形和椭圆。Adds three lines, a rectangle, and an ellipse. - 向屏幕绘制点的数组的值。Draws the values for the array of points to the screen. - 创建一个 对象。Creates a object. - 调用 方法。Calls the method. - 使用从对迭代的调用返回的值绘制开始和停止为每个到屏幕的子路径的值。Uses the values returned from the iterative calls to to draw the start and stop values for each subpath to the screen. - 向屏幕绘制子路径的总数的值。Draws the value for the total number of subpaths to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CPP/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/CS/form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.Drawing2D.ClassicGraphicsPathIterator/VB/form1.vb#8)]

summary.span: 将此 重绕到其关联路径的起始处。

span.span: Rewinds this to the beginning of its associated path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首次调用的迭代器方法，它获取该迭代器的关联路径的第一个图形 （子路径）。The first time you call the method of an iterator, it gets the first figure (subpath) of that iterator's associated path. 第二次，它获取第二个图中，依次类推。The second time, it gets the second figure, and so on. 当调用方法，即启动序列超过; 即之后你调用, ，下次调用获取第一个图的路径中。When you call the method, the sequence starts over; that is, after you call , the next call to gets the first figure in the path. 和方法的行为类似。The and methods behave similarly.

public: property int SubpathCount { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取路径中子路径的数目。

span.span: Gets the number of subpaths in the path.
The number of subpaths in the path.
